comments: sigma_12(n) is the sum of the 12th powers of the divisors of n.sigma[24j+12,x]/phi[x] is an integer for j in the range 0,..,500 for x=1,2,3,6,249,498,118578 and supposed to hold for possible larger terms of A015770 and all j. Compare with comments to A015759, A091285, A015762. - _Labos Elemer_, May 27 2004
